Physiotherapy Qualifying Examination Reading List
Anatomy & Physiology
• Lumley, J.S.P. (2008) Surface Anatomy –  the anatomical basis of clinical examination. (4 th ed.).
Edinburgh: Churchill Livingstone, Elsevier.
• Drake, R.L., Vogl, A.W., & Mitchell, A.W.M. (2015) Gray’s Anatomy for Student (3rd edition). New
York: Chur chill Livingstone, Elsevier.
• Moore, K. L., Dalley, A. F., & Agur, A. M. (2013).  Clinically oriented anatomy . Lippincott Williams &
Wilkins.
• Barrett, K. E., Barman, S. M., Boitano, S., & Brooks, H. (2009). Ganong’s review of medical physiology.
23. NY: McGr aw-Hill Medical.
Kinesiology
• Donald A. Neumann (2017). Kinesiology of the Musculoskeletal System. Foundation for Rehabilitation
(3rd edition). Mosby: Elsevier.
• Helen J Hislop, Dale Avers, Marybeth Brown (2014). Daniels and Worthingham’s Muscle testing
techniques of manual examination and performing testing. (9th edition). New York: Elsevier. (N.B. the
most recent edition is the 10 th, 2018)
• Norkin, C. C., & White, D. J. (2009). Measurement of joint motion: a guide to goniometry .
Philadelphia: FA Davis.
Cardiopulmonary
• Main & Denehy (Eds.) (2016). Cardiorespiratory Physiotherapy: Adults and Paediatrics (5th ed.).
Elsevier.
• Lumb AB. Nunn's Applied Respiratory Physiolog.  (8th Edition) Elsevier Health Sciences UK; 2017.
• Kumar P, Clark ML. Kumar and Clark's Clinical Medicine.   (9th Edition) Elsevier Health Sciences UK;
2016.
Musculoskeletal
• Magee D.J (2014). Orthopaedic Physical Assessment 6th edition W.B Saunders
• Maitland’ s peripheral Manipulation 5th Edition 2014 Churchill Livingstone Elsevier
• Maitland’s Vertebral Manipulation 8th Edition 2014 Churchill Livingstone Elsevier
Neurology
• Carr, J.and Shepherd, R. (2003) Stroke rehabilitation : guidelines for exercis e and training to  optimize
motor skill. New York : Butterworth -Heinemann.
• Carr J and Shepherd R (2010) Neurological Rehabilitation: Optimizing Motor Performance. London,
UK: Churchill Livingstone, Elsevier.
• Shumway -Cook A and Woollacott MH (2016) Motor Control:  Translating Research into Clinical
Practice  (4th edition). Philadelphia, US: Lippincott Williams & Wilkins.
• Umpred DA, Lazaro R, Roller ML and Burton G (2012) Neurological rehabilitation (6th edition. St Louis:
Mosby.
Women’s Health
• Bo K, Berghmans B, Morkved S, Van Kampen M.  Evidenced -Based Physical Thera py for the Pelvic
Floor: Bridging Science and Clinical Practice. 2nd ed. (Bo K, Berghmans B, Morkved S, Van Kampen M,
eds.). Churchill Livingstone, Elsevier; 2015. doi: https://doi.org/10.1016/C2009 -0-64182 -9.
• Croft S.  Pelvic Floor Recovery: Physiotherapy for Gynaecological and Colorectal Repair Surgery. 4th
ed. Sue Croft Physiotherapist; 2018.
• Lee D.  The Pelvic Girdle: An Approach to the Examination and Treatment of the Lumbopelvic -Hip
Region. Churchil l Livingstone, Elsevier; 2004.
• Croft S.  Pelvic Floor Recovery Essentials. 1st ed. Sue Croft Physiotherapist; 2012.
